fullText: Mark Rylance is brilliant as always, but even his immense talents can't save this dreary, overlong drama about an 18th-century Spanish king and his favorite castrato singer.
dtliExcerpt: Mark Rylance is brilliant as always, but even his immense talents can't save this dreary, overlong drama about an 18th-century Spanish king and his favorite castrato singer.
